response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value of $15,000, making it an excellent opportunity for you. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 14000}
